Package com.pushwords.web

package com.pushwords.web
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    IndexServlet
    IndexServlet handles requests for the index page.
    MemServlet
    MemServlet handles requests related to word groups for the current user.
    ReportServlet
    ReportServlet handles requests related to displaying test result reports.
    SignupServlet
    SignupServlet handles user registration requests.
    StudyServlet
    StudyServlet handles study-related requests, such as starting a study session and saving test results.
    UserServlet
    UserServlet handles user-related operations such as login, logout, profile updates, and registration.
    WordGroupServlet
    WordGroupServlet handles requests related to word groups such as listing, adding, updating, and deleting groups.
    WordServlet
    WordServlet handles requests related to words such as viewing, adding, updating, deleting, and translating words.
